channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Synology + Docker + VSCode
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: My new Synology NAS supports Docker and I can connect to it with VSCode for tinkering with all my horrible projects!</body></html>
